body: This is another part but it's in jp tho idk which part is it. Seems like a 1.5 https://nhentai.net/g/115370/ But anyway. It's better for her to stay away from that home cause shes been sexually abused by his bastard father. At least this guy is nice to her and she can find the happiness with him. All they need to do is to wait until she becomes legally an adult. In the meantime they can report to the police of what the father did to her, and if possible take her custody and take care of her.
Cute and sexy loli, good romance, good art, good characters, solid 7/10
So it's half-translated? Thanks to licorol+anon for their work!

Actually got bored of the rapey ones, Wholesome stuff like this is actually very enjoyable <3

@RED-ENERGY If 5/10 is average, this would deserve a 7/10 tbh. The art is very nice.

Man... This is quite nice, if you want to take a break from all the rape ones. I was thinking it might get boring but it's actually really nice and entertaining (I really want to see what happened in the past tho). The thought of sheltering a cute little abused loli is really nice and reletable. The lenght of it is perfect enough to fap and to get the story across. I guess the art is quite average (not bad at all tho). Solid 8/10
Omg! It got translated, YEEES!! So good.
I think I need a hug
The hentai is not at 69 pages. I'm disappointed.
That was bittersweet ...i wanna see more
This was amazing and illegal at just the right point!
The story is romantic and I wish for a loli gf to have purpose in my life for once.
